description.message: Fast balance viewer for your affiliate networks and partner programms

bugreport.message: GitHub: feature request of bug report

sitedescr_loveplanet.message: Affiliate programm of dating site loveplanet.ru. Payment to WebMoney and a Yandex.Money. Minimal - 300 RUR. Referral system.

sitedescr_cpazilla.message: Affiliate program of dating site fotostrana.ru. Pay per registration, from 1 to 75 RUR depending on age and gender. Payment to WebMoney and ePayments. Minimal - 300 RUR. Referral system available.

sitedescr_seriouspartner.message: Affiliate site contain collection of paid site on different themes: love, movies, products, adult, wapclick and other. High partners deductions: from 75% of revenue. Payments on the Webmoney (Z, R), PayPal, Paxum. Referral system available.

sitedescr_mylove.message: Affiliate program dating site mylove.ru. Pay 50%-70% of users payments. Payments in RUR to WebMoney or Qiwi wallets. Referral program available.

sitedescr_bongacash.message: Erotic video chat, pay up to $$3 per free registration. Payments to WebMoney, Paxum, Payoneer. Referral program available.

sitedescr_trafficshop.message: Popular Exchange buying and selling adult traffic. It works with payment systems: Epassporte, credit card, wire transfer, PayPal and WebMoney.

sitedescr_juicyads.message: One of the oldest and most well-known affiliate programm to earn money on adult advertising. Supported: Banner, Popunder, mobile redirect. The minimum amount of payment - $$50. Pay on PayPal, Paxum, Payza and a bank card.

sitedescr_halileo.message: File affiliate program. Paying up to $$25 for 1000 downloads. Registering bonus - $$5. Minimal payout -$$15. Pay to WebMoney and ePayments. Referral program available.

sitedescr_adsense.message: Most popular contextual advertising program. Payout to wire transfer or sending a check.

sitedescr_exoclick.message: One of the most well-known ad networks for adult and entertainment. It works with all types of advertising: banners, popunder, clickunder, IM windows, etc. The minimum payment amount - $$20. Paid through Paypal, Payoneer, Paxum or bank transfer.

sitedescr_mamba.message: Popular russian-language dating site. Pay a percentage of user charges. Payments only to PayPal.

sitedescr_profitraf.message: Monetize download traffic. Links to download from your site converts so that loader was downloaded first. Loader install the advertiser software (Amigo browser - in particular), and then downloads your file. Work with traffic from Russia and the CIS. Pay 3 to 4,8 WMR for installation. Payments on WebMoney. Registration by invite only!

sitedescr_epn.message: Excellent affiliate program online AliExpress stores, Ozone etc. You get 8.5% of the cost of goods sold! There is a large collection of tools, banners, and even ready-made CMS Online Store. Withdrawal of funds at WM, Qiwi, Yandex, ePayments and bank cards.

sitedescr_ad1.message: Reliable and well-known CPA network. Many popular offer of bonuses / discounts for client connection cabinets. Supported by the extension in test mode! If you see an error in displaying statistics - please contact the developer

sitedescr_shakes.message: Product listing affiliate. Leader in losing weight and increasing. All products are unique and Landing. Large deductions from sales.

sitedescr_redpays.message: Partner of one of the most popular adult dating sites. Payments in WMR up to 85% of earnings from the attracted user.

cacheinfo.message: Important: The data in the table are cached for 10 minutes. Cached data is displayed in gray.
